name: Spider Spirit
description: What is the project about? Spider is issued based on Ethereum and is a community-driven MeMe experiment. We believe that the power of all people can defeat everything. We hope to gather a group of people with encrypted beliefs based on the Spider community. What makes your project unique? Spider is different from other Memes Token, we have a strong community culture and operation foundation, we believe that Spider can lead everyone to form a new Meme culture History of your project. Spider started trading on Uniswap on May 21, and we updated the official website on June 12 Whatâ€™s next for your project? In the next step, we will launch more DEX and CEX, and plan to launch NFT, and unite more communities for marketing What can your token be used for? Spider is a representative of community culture, we can use Spider for DAO voting governance, use $Spider to purchase Spider series NFT
